title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4051.2 - Inspections, bandaging dispensed with
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4051.2 - Inspections, bandaging dispensed with

State Regulations

At meetings under the jurisdiction of the hunts
committee, the hunts committee may dispense with inspection of the plating and
bandaging of each horse as such horse enters the paddock before the race and
with the recording of the plating on a commission provided for the purpose in
the paddock. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4051.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
